text: The results of the qPCR analyses to quantify FPV viral load in faeces of NZ cats and to detect faecal co - pathogens are presented in Table 4 . Medical records were obtained from two unvaccinated kittens with FPL from Australia , where serial monitoring of FPV faecal shedding using qPCR was performed on pooled faecal samples after diagnosis . Testing was done at a single commercial laboratory , and results were reported as positive or negative ( Table 6 ) . Table 6 . Results of serial monitoring of faecal shedding of FPV in faecal samples from two cats diagnosed with FPL .
